mapper.select: select channel_id channelId, channel_name channelName, news_type newsTypeId, b.name newsTypeName, pic_url picUrl, link_url linkUrl from media_news_channel a inner join media_news_type b on a.news_type = b.id where a.status = 1
select channel_id channelId, channel_name channelName, news_type newsTypeId, link_url linkUrl, pic_url picUrl, status status from media_news_channel where channel_id = #{channelId}
mapper.insert: insert into media_news_channel ( channel_name, link_url, pic_url, status, news_type ) values ( #{channelName}, #{linkUrl}, #{picUrl}, #{status}, #{newsTypeId} )
